ygData.subject: Re: Sereph, do you still play on CT?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sabella Anna Estasis is the FULL name of my enchanter. At 20, you get a last name for your character, which in my case is Estasis , and the middle name Anna
ygData.messageBody:
Sabella Anna Estasis is the FULL name of my enchanter. At 20, you get a last name
for your character, which in my case is "Estasis", and the middle name "Anna" was
granted by a GM for "special condition" since my character plays a part in some
of the GM runed event in CT.

Just run a /who Sabella all or /who enchanter 50 all to locate me, but I'm not
playing much in CT lately. Only log in when the bastard GMs need me to talk cock
or twinker me, dragon slaying or duelings. Nowadays, spent the bulk of my time in
Inno with my level 34 Cleric Fesse Estasis(alright, start your power leveling
complains now!)

Come over to Inno or Prexus lah. CT has a very low porpulation of S'porean. Seen
only 2 so far, and have already forgotten their names.

Sabella Anna Estasis, Enchanter of the Highest Circle (Cazic Thule)
Fesstella(Fesse) Kregain Estasis, 8th Rank Cleric of Tunare (Innoruuk)

Chen Lizhi wrote:

> From: "Chen Lizhi" <polarcoordinates@...>
>
> What is your name in game? Sabella? Anna? Or Estasis? I look for you
> everytime I log on and cannot see you playing leh. BTW, the guild in Innoruk
> active anot? I got a low (very low) level Druid in Innoruk. If guild active
> I'll consider switching server, if not active one I stay in CT play liao.
> BTW, any other Singaporeans in CT? I know there's another Troll/Ogre by the
> name of Ungaroth. Met him once, but that time don't know he is a
> Singaporean. Got any other anot?
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
